Transform the way you manage time with the Billed Time Tracking, your new ally in productivity. 

Tailored for busy professionals, freelancers, and teams, this browser extension empowers you to track time effortlessly on any project or task, directly from your browser. 

No more switching between apps or losing focus. Start and stop the timer with a click, and it seamlessly logs your time in your Billed account. 

Experience the freedom of tracking time without keeping the Billed app open, and focus on what truly matters - your work.

Getting Started:

1.Install the Extension: Add it to your browser from the extension store.
2.Log In with Ease: Use your existing Billed account to log in via the extension.
3.Begin Tracking: With one click, start recording time spent on tasks.
4.Seamless Management: Stop the timer to automatically save your session; manage and review logs in your Billed account.

You can also bill your clients for the time tracked using Billed. You can easily create invoices from the time tracked and send them to your clients to get paid faster. 

For help visit https://help.billed.app
For any issues or support queries please reach out at support@billed.app
